name: SuperWorm Endless Flyer Beta
description:
This is a crappy endless flyer based off of my character Superworm. I have a youtube channel here if ya wanna:https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzwuAh42IZkJU2ukRTttWIg

Update: Added sound, polish, and fixed a bug.

Another Update: Bug fixes, WASD Controls, and a pause menu.

Yet Another Update: Added Robo Slime, an enemy.
